name: cables-electron-build-skeleton
description: electron build skeleton for cables patch export
author: undefined development <hi@undev.de>

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules/ && rm -rf src/node_modules/ && find src/patches/ -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 ! -name default ! -name .gitignore -exec rm -rf {} \;
scripts.package: ./update_electron.sh 7.1.1 && dotenv cross-var ./build.sh win32-x64 zip %PATCH_NAME% && dotenv cross-var ./build.sh darwin-x64 zip %PATCH_NAME% && dotenv cross-var ./build.sh linux-x64 zip %PATCH_NAME%
